title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
and Solve the Open Hand Temple Murders, or Investigate the Suspicious Toys. Find your way into the Lower City then make your way to the Szarr Palace. Once you find your way into the Palace, you can move on to the next objective.

There are doors at each watch tower. Go though the Szarr Palace South Tower by the Lower City Central Wall. If you try to enter and head up the ladder, you may be stopped by the guards. Your interactions here will affect Investigate Cazador's Palace. If you pass the ass
